Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 8.1.4

==Policy Statement==

Disable inactive accounts periodically.

==Policy Purpose==

Accounts that are not actively used should be disabled to prevent attackers from using them.

==Related Guidance==

* [[9205a02e-d583-4a11-9d4a-9f2b2f090772|Automatically Lock Inactive User Accounts]]

==Related Checklist Items==

* [[2ebcada9-919f-414b-9fdf-8a7cb15fb870|Inactive User Accounts Are Automatically Locked]]
